quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
name: Steve Jobs
html:
“The only way to do great work is to love what you do.” —
Steve Jobs

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
name: Confucius
html:
“It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.” —
Confucius

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
name: Winston Churchill
html:
“Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.” —
Winston Churchill

quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson
html:
“What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.” —
Ralph Waldo Emerson
imageAlt: A photo of Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
name: Wayne Gretzky
html:
“You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.” —
Wayne Gretzky

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
name: Eleanor Roosevelt
html:
“The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.” —
Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
name: Theodore Roosevelt
html:
“Believe you can and you’re halfway there.” —
Theodore Roosevelt

quote: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
name: Albert Einstein
html:
“In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.” —
Albert Einstein

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
name: William James
html:
“Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.” —
William James

quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
name: Henry David Thoreau
html:
“Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.” —
Henry David Thoreau
imageAlt: A photo of Henry David Thoreau

quote: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.
name: Maya Angelou
html:
“You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.” —
Maya Angelou

quote: Your time is limited, don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
name: Steve Jobs
html:
“Your time is limited, don’t waste it living someone else’s life.” —
Steve Jobs

quote: If you can dream it, you can achieve it.
name: Zig Ziglar
html:
“If you can dream it, you can achieve it.” —
Zig Ziglar

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
name: Peter Drucker
html:
“The best way to predict the future is to create it.” —
Peter Drucker

quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
name: Walt Whitman
html:
“Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.” —
Walt Whitman

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
name: Franklin D. Roosevelt
html:
“The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.” —
Franklin D. Roosevelt
imageAlt: A photo of Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
name: Zig Ziglar
html:
“What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.” —
Zig Ziglar

quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
name: Winston Churchill
html:
“Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.” —
Winston Churchill

quote: Your life is your story, and the adventure ahead of you is the journey to fulfill your own purpose and potential.
name: Kerry Washington
html:
“Your life is your story, and the adventure ahead of you is the journey to fulfill your own purpose and potential.” —
Kerry Washington

quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
name: Walt Disney
html:
“The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.” —
Walt Disney
